subject: Fix OneSignal service worker loading on web platforms
body:
- Update OneSignalSDKWorker.js to use correct SDK v16 service worker script (.sw.js instead of .page.js)
- Add Vercel rewrite rule to exclude service worker from catch-all routing
- Update documentation with OneSignal deployment requirements

Fixes "DOMException: The operation is insecure" error when loading OneSignal on Firefox and other browsers. The catch-all rewrite was intercepting service worker requests, causing script evaluation failures.
title: Fix OneSignal service worker loading on web platforms
